name: com.szczypiorofix.scormintegration
description:
A simple module for integrating WebGL projects with LMS using the SCORM standard.
Includes a ready-made template and communication scripts.
The project also contains an example scene (Samples~/ExampleScene/ExampleIntegrationScene), which demonstrates a very simple integration and operation of the package. It is best to import this scene using the Samples tab and selecting Import for the provided example scene.

samples.description: Contains a scene with SCORM API integration and attached scripts for WebGL communication.
